articles.author: David Nelson
articles.title: These are the batches of pet food recalled after salmonella outbreak - AS USA
articles.description: Multiple brands made by Mid America Pet Foods have been voluntarily recalled, with the FDA and CDC investigating seven human cases of Salmonella infection.
articles.content: Mid America Pet Foods, the manufacturer at the centre of a Salmonella outbreak linked to their products, has expanded their voluntary recall to cover further pet food products made at their Mount Ple… [+2712 chars]
